channel.title: Ms DOS section
channel.description: i think we should have a forum for tutorials in DOS/.bat things, i like to see all the things that you can do with DOS, and i'm sad that we don't have a forum for it, people could post viruses, but a mod would just lock it and ban them, there should be a DOS cup too, not sure what it would be though.

item.title: Ms DOS section
item.dc:creator: @Dawn Dawn
item.description:
@Dawn wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:9, topic:88774”]the only thing i like about linux is teh command line, which is why im more than happy to continue running windows w/ cygwin

offtopic: ino u hev seen me now, cm++[/quote]
To many e-penises?

Read full topic

item.title: Ms DOS section
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“SuperNewb, post:11, topic:88774”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=129913.msg1263958#msg1263958 date=1178329324]

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=129913.msg1261295#msg1261295 date=1178263428]

Just use the general programming section if you are writing programs in a batch file. You really should look into shell scripts though, they are much more powerful.
[/quote]SINCE WHEN DID A SHELL SCRIPT RUN ON WINDOES DKHED!?!?!!!

sudo apt-get remove windows
sudo apt-get remove frank_
[/quote]use aptitude :D[/quote]

Psst, I linux noob.

But in all seriousness, a section and award for everything would be stupid. This community is mainly java so there’s a java section, web design and everything else should go into general programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Ms DOS section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:6, topic:88774”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=129913.msg1259750#msg1259750 date=1178246502]
Just use the general programming section if you are writing programs in a batch file. You really should look into shell scripts though, they are much more powerful.
[/quote]SINCE WHEN DID A SHELL SCRIPT RUN ON WINDOES DKHED!?!?!!![/quote]

They don’t natively, but you can always hack it with cygwin.

(or better yet ditch windows and install linux)
